Package de.bcxp.challenge.utility

Class ParameterValidationUtility

java.lang.Object
de.bcxp.challenge.utility.ParameterValidationUtility
public final class ParameterValidationUtility extends Object
Utility class providing methods to check method parameters for validity.

  • Method Details

    • validateString

      public static void validateString(String string, org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger logger, String errorLogMessage, String exceptionMessage) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Validates that the provided string is non-null and not empty.
      Parameters:
      string - the string to validate
      logger - the logger to use for warnings
      errorLogMessage - the message to log if validation fails
      exceptionMessage - the message to include in the thrown exception.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the string is null or empty

    • validateCollection

      public static void validateCollection(Collection<?> collection, org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger logger, String logMessage, String exceptionMessage) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Validates that the provided Collection and its contents are non-null and not empty.
      Parameters:
      collection - the collection to validate
      logger - the logger to use for warnings
      logMessage - the message to log if validation fails
      exceptionMessage - the message to include in the thrown exception
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the list is null or empty

    • validateDocument

      public static <T extends DocumentEntry> void validateDocument(Document<T> document, org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger logger, String logMessage, String exceptionMessage)
      Validates that the provided document is non-null and not empty.
      Type Parameters:
      T - type of DocumentEntry the document should contain
      Parameters:
      document - The Document to validate
      logger - the logger to use for warnings
      logMessage - the message to log if validation fails
      exceptionMessage - the message to include in the thrown exception

    • validateNumericTupleDocumentEntries

      public static <T extends DocumentEntry> void validateNumericTupleDocumentEntries(List<T> entries)
      Checks if DocumentEntry in provided Document implements the IEntryWithComparableNumericTuple interface
      Type Parameters:
      T - type of DocumentEntry the document should contain
      Parameters:
      entries - DocumentEntry objects contained in a Document
